adrFormatAddress: 126 E 12th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Pippa and her team are the absolute best. I searched everywhere and they were the only studio who offered more traditional, classic options. Our wedding album turned out beautifully. It's not an easy process to narrow down the number of photos, but Pippa was incredibly patient and understanding - and always offered her keen eye and opinion on tough calls. Highly recommend!

text.text: Pippa and her team are the absolute best. I searched everywhere and they were the only studio who offered more traditional, classic options. Our wedding album turned out beautifully. It's not an easy process to narrow down the number of photos, but Pippa was incredibly patient and understanding - and always offered her keen eye and opinion on tough calls. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I cannot recommend The Album Room enough! My sister-in-law recommended this place when she did her wedding album over 10 years ago,  and from the moment we walked in I knew we were making the right choice. Pippa was absolutely wonderful - so helpful in guiding us through the process and made an overwhelming process very easy. Our album came out absolutely gorgeous. We are so happy with our wedding album and will cherish it forever. Thank you Pippa!

originalText.text: Absolutely loved working with Pippa and we couldn't be more pleased with our final product. Our wedding album looks perfect, turnaround time was quick, and responsiveness during the entire process was always on point. Would absolutely highly recommend!

text.text: Absolutely loved working with Pippa and we couldn't be more pleased with our final product. Our wedding album looks perfect, turnaround time was quick, and responsiveness during the entire process was always on point. Would absolutely highly recommend!

originalText.text: Thanks to The Album room, I now have an amazing book of all my treasured family photos. It's a large and beautiful book, whose creation was such a pleasure from beginning to end. The Album Room thought of so many details to make this book happen so wonderfully. The care taken with my irreplaceable photos was phenomenal and comforting. I could not recommend The Album Room more highly. The experience and end result of this project is fantastic...a huge thank you to The Album Room.

text.text: Thanks to The Album room, I now have an amazing book of all my treasured family photos. It's a large and beautiful book, whose creation was such a pleasure from beginning to end. The Album Room thought of so many details to make this book happen so wonderfully. The care taken with my irreplaceable photos was phenomenal and comforting. I could not recommend The Album Room more highly. The experience and end result of this project is fantastic...a huge thank you to The Album Room.

originalText.text: We recently received our wedding album from the The Album Room and my husband and I couldn't be happier with how it turned out. From start to finish the process with Pippa was easy. She answered all my questions and helped me pick the best options for our album. We are so happy we chose her to showcase our special day. I would highly recommend working with her if you want a beautiful album that will last a lifetime.
